## ReactNativeAsyncStorage.setItem() method

Persist an item in storage.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setItem(key: string, value: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | storage key. |
|  value | string | storage value. |
